atbat.des: Alfonso Soriano called out on strikes.

pitch.cc: Aaron Harang went back to the slider even though Alfonso Soriano hit for a single last time up.
Alfonso Soriano may sit on the changeup here, since Aaron Harang would rather go after him than on-deck hitter Aramis Ramirez.

atbat.des: Geovany Soto called out on strikes.

pitch.cc: Aaron Harang has thrown 100 pitches; he holds opposing hitters to a .315 average in the first 100 pitches and .500 after that.
Aaron Harang is trying to tie up Geovany Soto with fastballs inside, where Geovany Soto hits .400.

atbat.des: Starlin Castro doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Jay Bruce.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Mike Fontenot replaces Tom Gorzelanny.
Pitcher Change: Mike Lincoln replaces Aaron Harang, batting 9th.

atbat.des: Ryan Theriot singles on a soft ground ball to pitcher Mike Lincoln. Starlin Castro to 3rd. Mike Fontenot to 2nd.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Arthur Rhodes replaces Mike Lincoln, batting 9th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Xavier Nady replaces Kosuke Fukudome.

atbat.des: Xavier Nady walks. Starlin Castro scores. Mike Fontenot to 3rd. Ryan Theriot to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Arthur Rhodes is trying to tie up Xavier Nady with fastballs inside, where Xavier Nady hits .200.

atbat.des: Derrek Lee grounds out softly, pitcher Arthur Rhodes to first baseman Joey Votto.

pitch.cc: Arthur Rhodes is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Jerry Layne.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Esmailin Caridad replaces Tom Gorzelanny, batting 1st, replacing second baseman Ryan Theriot.
Xavier Nady remains in the game as the right fielder.
Mike Fontenot remains in the game as the second baseman.

atbat.des: Orlando Cabrera reaches on fielding error by shortstop Starlin Castro.

action.des: With Brandon Phillips batting, Orlando Cabrera steals (4) 2nd base.

atbat.des: Brandon Phillips reaches on fielding error by second baseman Mike Fontenot. Orlando Cabrera to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Esmailin Caridad is trying to tie up Brandon Phillips with fastballs inside, where Brandon Phillips hits .263.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Sean Marshall replaces Esmailin Caridad, batting 1st.

atbat.des: Joey Votto walks. Brandon Phillips to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Sean Marshall went back to the slider even though Joey Votto hit for a home run last time up.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Carlos Zambrano replaces Sean Marshall, batting 1st.

atbat.des: Jonny Gomes singles on a line drive to right fielder Xavier Nady. Orlando Cabrera scores. Brandon Phillips scores. Joey Votto to 3rd.
Jay Bruce grounds out, first baseman Derrek Lee to pitcher Carlos Zambrano. Jonny Gomes to 2nd.
Drew Stubbs singles on a soft ground ball to shortstop Starlin Castro. Joey Votto scores. Jonny Gomes scores.

pitch.cc: Carlos Zambrano is trying to tie up Drew Stubbs with fastballs inside, where Drew Stubbs hits .211.
Carlos Zambrano shows faith in Geovany Soto by throwing the splitter in the dirt.

atbat.des: Ryan Hanigan doubles (4) on a fly ball to right fielder Xavier Nady. Drew Stubbs scores.

pitch.cc: Carlos Zambrano went back to the four-seam fastball even though Ryan Hanigan hit for a single last time up.
Carlos Zambrano is trying to tie up Ryan Hanigan with fastballs inside, where Ryan Hanigan hits .286.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Laynce Nix replaces Arthur Rhodes.

atbat.des: Laynce Nix grounds out, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to first baseman Derrek Lee.

pitch.cc: Carlos Zambrano is getting squeezed this inning by home plate ump Jerry Layne.
